title: LDL
author: LDL
content: I've been noticing on this forum for quite some time now that many legendary members use cap hats on their profiles without doing a signature campaign.  Why do they do this, I really want to know.  Please let me clear this up.

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: Quote from: LDL on November 07, 2022, 02:13:32 PMI've been noticing on this forum for quite some time now that many legendary members use cap hats on their profiles without doing a signature campaign.  Why do they do this, I really want to know.  Please let me clear this up....all the members you mention make posts not to be paid. they are not involved in paid signature or avatar campaigns, and they are not marketing a service so in conclusion, they wear that hat "just for fun".

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Shaha98 on November 08, 2022, 04:54:35 AMFrom what I understand people who don't expect to get paid on this forum are the only ones using caps. Not really, as you can still be a part of signature campaign and use cap as avatar and it all depends on whether your signature requires you to wear a specific avatar. For example, in my campaign I can use whatever I want as avatar and in some campaigns like BestChange you can use hat as avatar but you have to put their log on it.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Remember when a lot of Bitcoiners/cryptopeeps on Twitter were using profile pictures with laser eyes? Yea, it's pretty much just some trendy thing — just in this case with the hats, in a far smaller scale. Don't over-analyze it.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Well, you have your answers as why those legendaries wore cap avatars and as to why they wore it. At first, when I saw someone change their avatar into cap with different designs, I thought it was some kind of promotion of their services or whatever they wanted people to know but later on it became a trend. You can say that it is like a gang in bitcointalk forum much like the other forum gang and you can say that it is a Avatar Cap gang which their emblem is a cap with any designs that the member wanted and you can also say that the founder is the one who created it.
